uppabbajati：[ud-pabbajati] 還俗．pp．uppabbajita 已還俗； caus．uppabbājeti 使還俗，逐出教團； pp．uppabbājita； caus．uppabbajāpeti 使逐出，使驅逐．
uppabbajati：[ud-pabbajati] 還俗す．pp．uppabbajita 還俗せる； caus．uppabbājeti 還俗せしむ，教團を追放する； pp．uppabbājita； caus．uppabbajāpeti 追放させる．

uppabbajati： uppabbajati（kri）
ဥပ္ပဗ္ဗဇတိ（ကြိ）
«u+pa+vaja+a+ti»
[ဥ+ပ+ဝဇ+အ+တိ]
uppabbajati：[u + pa + vaj + a] leaves the Order．

Uppabbajati，[ud + pabbajati] to leave the Order DhA．I，68； PvA．55．-- pp．°pabbajita．-- Caus．uppabbājeti to turn out of the Order J．IV，219； DhA．IV，195．-- Caus．II．uppabbajāpeti to induce some one to leave the Order J．IV，304．（Page 152）
uppabbajati：To leave the monkhood throw off the robes
UPPABBAJATI：（u+pa+vaj+a） rời khỏi giáo hội，hoàn tục [aor] --baji [abs] --jitvā

uppabbajati：ဥပ္ပဗ္ဗဇတိ（ကြိ）
[ဥ+ပ+ဝဇ+အ+တိ]
လူထွက်၏။
uppabbajati：ဥပ္ပဗ္ဗဇတိ
